question: For what did the 'T' stand in the name of 'Captain James T. Kirk' in 'Star Trek'?
vanilla_rag_result: The 'T' in the name of 'Captain James T. Kirk' in 'Star Trek' stands for 'Tiberius.' This was revealed in the animated series "Star Trek: The Animated Series" and was later entered into live-action canon in the movies.
